text:
[Verse]
Woke up feeling bright
Sunshine in my eyes
A brand-new day ahead
No clouds in the sky

[Verse 2]
Dancing in the street
Rhythm in my feet
Neighbors wave hello
Life is oh so sweet

[Chorus]
Sunshine smiles all day
Chasing blues away
Feel the warmth inside
Joy we can't deny

[Verse 3]
Laughter's all around
Music's playing loud
Friends are gathering near
Happiness to be found

[Bridge]
Underneath the sun
We have just begun
Celebrate this life
Together
Everyone

[Chorus]
Sunshine smiles all day
Chasing blues away
Feel the warmth inside
Joy we can't deny
title: Sunshine Smiles
